name: Live Through Greg’s Dream
description:
Greg has a reoccurring nightmare where his hair, teeth, and eye’s fall out and try to kill him. Get his parts back and get him back to bed to survive the night!

Game Created for the LTGD LTGJ using construct on mobile.

Controls: tap/click the area you would like to go and Greg will go there

If you are stuck you may press the “ReSleep” button to get a new Dream
